title: Can’t download embedded audio
content:
This audio sample that I’m trying to download: https://www.audiotool.com/sample/hard_spinz_-_808 doesn’t appear to be listed when viewing the source code. I’ve looked over the whole page multiple times, tried inspect element as well, but I still can’t find a link to the embedded audio. This goes for all the other samples on the site.

Is there a solution to this?
